bike.description: NEW Fuji T-T C-4 carbon w/Marble UD carbon, Integrated aluminum cupped head tube w/1 1/2" lower, Integrates Aero seat tube, Internalcable routing, Oversized PIIS BB shell,  Double water bottle mounts.
sizes: XS(50cm), S(52cm), M(54cm), M/L(56cm), L(58cm), XL(60cm)

components.description: C-4 carbon thin seat stays, Oversized chain stay w/ETC and forged alloy drop out w/replaceable hanger
NEW Fuji FC-440 Carbon Monocoque Integrated 1 1/8" Carbon steerer
NEW Shimano Ultegra HollowTech II w/7075 CNC 39/53T Chainrings
NEW Shimano Ultrega STI shifter/brake, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Vittoria Rubino Pro II, 700 x 23c Foldable
NEW Shimano Ultegra dual pivot w/cartridge pad
FSA No. 42 1 1/8"U- 1 1/2"L Integrated, w/Alloy convex topcap
Fuji PGC Double Butted 7075 Aluminum 31.8mm Road
